titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: TPRG-SEND TWO YEAR CORRECTED AGE OUTCOME ASSESSMENT SCORE (RENAL QUESTION B) - Description

div.p: TPRG-SEND TWO YEAR CORRECTED AGE OUTCOME ASSESSMENT SCORE (RENAL QUESTION B) is the PERSON SCORE for question B of the Renal section of the TPRG-SEND Two Year Corrected Age Outcome Assessment.
The question asks "Is this child on dietary or drug treatment for renal impairment?".
